Html:
Not sure if this should be in the VS forums or not, but since the typescript crew are closely aligned with VS, I've thought of starting here.

Can anyone explain to me why auto brace completion for typescript text editing is not enabled? When editing on visual studio 2013 rc 2 javascript files, auto brace completion works flawlessly, so why doesn't it work on VS 2013 as well?
The feature has not been implemented yet. I can share the public interface with you if you would like to help implementing it :)

how much work do you think it would be? I'm not familiar in this space.

Sent from Windows Mail
